page.title: 14Menus of a N.St Ives family
page.content: I am probably a member of a typical St Ives family.I am going to tell you about the meals my family eats on a typical day. My family usually has cereal and toast for breakfast.For our breakfast drink we usually have a cup of tea.At lunch we sometimes have cheese on toast or spaghetti on toast.After that we have fruit or cake.And we have fruit juice or tea. For our tea on a typical day we have any sort of meat,potatoes or chips and any sort of 2 vegetables. For pudding we have fruit and cream or ice cream.For our drink we have tea or coffee.Sometimes we do not have a pudding.If we have a snack we have a packet of crisps or a bar of chocolate.
